Articles.Content:
Hello. Dennis here with a new challenge. Your task.... is to build ships that look like the ships in the pictures! there are extra challenges to each of these ships.

Rules:

1. only stock parts and B9 areospace packs are allowed.

2. the ship/craft must be able to do any of the catagory

fly in space/drive on land/go under the ocean

3. to the rule above, there are requirements. if you are to do specific ships that are shown as spaceships or planes, they must be able to fly or have space fating capabilities to the least, orbit. if it is a car, you must be able to drive it on any planet other than kerbin. if it is a submarine, it must be able to go under kerbin's ocean without falling apart. if it is a boat, it must be able to go to the island airstrip without falling apart. if it is a battlestation, it must be able to take on srb crashes.

4. screenshots must be provided on every challenge.

5. craft files of the contestants are to be uploaded somewhere.

6. if the original ship does not work, please change it minorly until it works.

photo links

http://oyster.ignimgs.com/ve3d/images/04/78/47810_JumpgateEvolution-ConceptArt-03.jpg

http://conceptartworld.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/08/BLAST-Spaceship_Sketches_and_Renderings_08a.jpg

http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-LT_7zvk6Ezk/UARIWY9tb7I/AAAAAAAAAVw/L_t-d60SDTo/s1600/shovelnose_ConceptArt.jpg

you can also submit concept art in the comments.

good luck!

(p.s. i can't give my entry since i am too busy!)

Edited June 3, 2013 by dennislin
the rule is bad
Somebody make a virus that prevents the OP from ever loading a ships that looks like those.

Proof of concept is needed. If you're schedule is too busy to test your own challenge to make sure it's reasonably possible, then you shouldn't post the challenge to begin with.

Sci-fi ships are typically made to look cool, not be functional machines. The contrasting tech between these concepts and KSP, make the probability of creating a functional craft slim to none.
